description: Convey Tour HS Hooded Jacket Men is the rain jacket for absolute weather protection and all the functions of a hiking jacket. Waterproof, Windproof, snd Breathable; all thanks to Gore-Tex® Paclite. The high-quality and lightweight material makes the hard shell jacket feel very comfortable. Easy Combine makes it possible to pair the jacket with various insulated jackets and mid-layers. More comfort. Lighter weight. More performance. With the Convey Tour HS Hooded Jacket Men.
name: Mammut Convey Tour HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
